Hot tours

Turkey, Alanya

First Class Hotel

The hotel is located in the village of Kargicak, near the city of Alanya, across the street from the beach. It is one six-storey building. Most of the rooms with sea views. It was opened in 2005, the last renovation was carried out in 2017. Cozy hotel with a landscaped area. Nice animation program. Suitable for families and young people.

Number of persons: 2

Room and meals: Room Standard (AL)

Tour length: 7 deys

625 usd

Tunisia, Mahdia

Thalassa Mahdia

The hotel is located 4 km from the center of Mahdia. The hotel first opened its doors to guests in 2002, and the last renovation was made in 2008. The hotel is perfect for a family vacation or for a romantic trip.

Number of persons: 2

Room and meals: Room Promo (AL)

Tour length: 10 deys

1`145 usd

UAE, Dubai

Citymax Bur Dubai

The hotel is located a 5-minute walk from Berjuman Tower Business Center and Dubai Creek. The hotel was opened in 2010 and renovated in 2014. Consists of one 8-storey building. Cozy hotel, windows can be opened in the rooms. Metro or taxi to Downtown, shopping malls and the Gold Souk are all 10 minutes away. We recommend the hotel for spa holidays and business trips..

Number of persons: 2

Room and meals: Room Standard (OB)

Tour length: 7 deys

803 usd

Egypt, Sharm El Sheikh

Regency Plaza Aqua Park & Spa Resort

Дата открытия – 2006 год, дата последнего ремонта – 2017 год. Особенностью отеля является его отдаленность от развлекательного центра Наама Бэй, большая, зеленая территория и активное море. Состоит из четырнадцати 3-этажных корпусов. Гости отель могут заняться различными водными видами спорта, а в дайвинг-центре отеля можно организовать сафари-круизы на катере. Рекомендуется для семейного и молодежного отдыха.

Number of persons: 2

Room and meals: Room Standard (UAL)

Tour length: 6 deys

534 usd
